cause.description:
She has quit her job and we dont want her to start walking the streets because we feel she is not strong enough to fend off any crazy men and shes not good with managers so a pimp is out of the question. HELP HER PLZ!!!
1. She needs food.
2. Shes very thin, she wont last long without food.
3. Um.... just find some food.
cause.mission: Raise money to buy Norma a sandwhich.
cause.name: Feed Norma
